author: Elastic
description: Identifies the deletion of a specified AWS Web Application Firewall (WAF) rule or rule group.
false_positives: WAF rules or rule groups may be deleted by a system or network administrator. Verify whether the user identity, user agent, and/or hostname should be making changes in your environment. Rule deletions from unfamiliar users or hosts should be investigated. If known behavior is causing false positives, it can be exempted from the rule.
name: AWS WAF Rule or Rule Group Deletion
note: The AWS Filebeat module must be enabled to use this rule.
query: event.dataset:aws.cloudtrail and event.action:(DeleteRule or DeleteRuleGroup) and event.outcome:success
